= Server installation =
 # Start server
  * On Linux:
{{{
./bin/openfire start
}}}
  * On Windows:
{{{
./bin/openfire.exe start
}}}
 # Open http://localhost:9090 and follow installation instructions (use *Embedded Database* and set server name to *localhost*)
 # Restart server
  * On Linux:
{{{
./bin/openfire stop
./bin/openfire start
}}}
  * On Windows:
{{{
./bin/openfire.exe stop
./bin/openfire.exe start
}}}
 # Open http://localhost:9090 and login as admin
 # Install "User Import Export" plugin
 # Import users from openfire-users.xml
 # Create persistent room with following settings:
  * Room Name: neerc
  * Broadcast Presence for: Moderator, Participant, Visitor
  * Show Real JIDs of Occupants to: Moderator
  * Room Options: Log Room Conversations
 # Modify group chat service settings
  * History Settings: Show Entire Chat History
